      • isFourOfAKindPhoenix

        public static boolean isFourOfAKindPhoenix​(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        Same as method isFourOfAKindBomb, but with the phoenix it's not a bomb. Phoenix control.
        Parameters:
        cards - move to analise
        Returns:
        isFourOfAKindPhoenix boolean

      • isFullHouse

        public static boolean isFullHouse​(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        The first 3 cards and the second 2, or the first 2 and the following 3 cards need to be the same. Phoenix control implemented.
        Parameters:
        cards - hand
        Returns:
        isFullHouse

      • isOnePair

        public static boolean isOnePair​(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        checks if cards contain two cards of the same rank or a phoenix and a random second card
        Parameters:
        cards - hand
        Returns:
        isOnePair

      • isSteps

        public static boolean isSteps​(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        Check if there are 4 or more cards in the array, if not return false. If there are, check if they are pairs and the rank is one higher then the first pair.
        Parameters:
        cards - hand
        Returns:
        isSteps

      • isStraight

        public static boolean isStraight​(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        Check if every following Card is one rank higher then the one before. Also check if there are special cards included.
        Parameters:
        cards - hand
        Returns:
        isStraight

      • isStraightFlushBomb

        public static boolean isStraightFlushBomb​(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        Check first if it is a Straight,in method straight ist already checked if it contains * a special card. If method isStraight() is true, then check Suits of card.
        Parameters:
        cards - move to analise
        Returns:
        isStraightFlush boolean

      • isThreeOfAKind

        public static boolean isThreeOfAKind​(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        Check if three cards in the Array have the same rank. Phoenix control implemented.
        Parameters:
        cards - hand
        Returns:
        isThreeOfAKind

      • isValidMove

        public static boolean isValidMove​(java.util.ArrayList<Card> oldMove,
                                  java.util.ArrayList<Card> newMove)
        Will compare the previous move to the current one and evaluate if the new move is not only valid, but also beats the previous.
        Parameters:
        oldMove - previous move
        newMove - current move
        Returns:
        isValidMove

        public static Combination valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this type. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the enum constant with the specified name
        Throws:

      • values

        public static Combination[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (Combination c : Combination.values())
    System.out.println(c);
